SetAssociative cache¶

File: cache.py

Author: Priyanka Selvarathinavel

Contains method to instantiate required cache.

cache.create_cache(set_count, set_size, strategy='LRU', callback=None)[source]¶

Returns instantiated specialized cache object based on strategy.

Raises exceptions.IncorrectConfigurationException for invalid strategy.

Parameters:
  • set_count (int) – Number of sets in the cache
  • set_size (int) – Number of entries in a cache set
  • strategy (str) – Replacement strategy ‘LRU’, ‘MRU’ or ‘CUSTOM’
  • callback (argument: OrderedDict) – Method that removes an element from a cache set
Returns:

Specialized cache object
Return type:

subclasses of cacheReplacement.Cache

SetAssociative cache_replacement¶

File: cache_replacement.py

Author: Priyanka Selvarathinavel

Contains abstract Cache class followed by specialized cache classes based on replacement strategies.

class cache_replacement.Cache(set_count, set_size)[source]¶

Abstract class for caches of different replacement strategies

get(key)[source]¶

Returns value in cache for a given key.

Parameters:key (any) – Key we need value for
Returns:(True, value of key) or (False ,None)
Return type:bool, any
get_set(key)[source]¶

Calculates set value for a new key.

Parameters:key (any) – Key to be inserted
Returns:tag value, set value
Return type:int, int
put(key, value)[source]¶

Inserts a new key into the cache

Parameters:
  • key (any) – Key to be inserted
  • value (any) – Value for the key to be inserted
strategy_to_replace(set_)[source]¶

Abstract method. Must be implemented by subclasses.

class cache_replacement.CustomCache(set_count, set_size, callback)[source]¶

Specialized class for CUSTOM replacement strategy cache.

strategy_to_replace(set_)[source]¶

Calls provided callback function that Removes an element from the cache set

Parameters:set (int) – cache set to delete from
class cache_replacement.LRUcache(set_count, set_size)[source]¶

Specialized class for LRU replacement strategy cache.

strategy_to_replace(set_)[source]¶

Deletes item in cache set according to LRU strategy

Parameters:set (int) – cache set to delete from
class cache_replacement.MRUcache(set_count, set_size)[source]¶

Specialized class for MRU replacement strategy cache.

strategy_to_replace(set_)[source]¶

Deletes item in cache set according to MRU strategy

Parameters:set (int) – cache set to delete from
